com.dennisturco - package com.dennisturco
 

E

ExceptionDialogListener - Interface in com.dennisturco
Listener interface for handling user actions from the exception dialog.
ExceptionPopupMessage - Class in com.dennisturco
A utility class for displaying exception messages to users with options to copy the stack trace to the clipboard or report the error via a URL.
ExceptionPopupMessage(String, Icon, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class com.dennisturco.ExceptionPopupMessage
Constructs an ExceptionPopupMessage with clipboard copy and no reporting URL.
ExceptionPopupMessage(String, Icon, boolean, boolean, String) - Constructor for class com.dennisturco.ExceptionPopupMessage
Constructs an ExceptionPopupMessage with clipboard copy and error reporting options.

onClose() - Method in interface com.dennisturco.ExceptionDialogListener
Called when the user closes the error dialog.
onCopyToClipboard(String) - Method in interface com.dennisturco.ExceptionDialogListener
Called when the user chooses to copy the stack trace to the clipboard.
onReportError(String) - Method in interface com.dennisturco.ExceptionDialogListener
Called when the user chooses to report the error.
openExceptionMessage(String, Throwable) - Method in class com.dennisturco.ExceptionPopupMessage
Displays the error dialog to the user.
